get.description:
Search Response has two flavors:

1)      SIMPLE TYPE

2)      SPLIT TYPE

 

Core elements of SIMPLE Search Response:

1)      simple

o   This is a root node for simple type of response.

2)      simple.recoms

o   root node consists of list of recommendations.

3)      simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].itneraryJourneys

o   Each Recommendation consist of List of Journeys

4)      simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].itneraryJourneys[journeyIndex].flightPnrLookupInfo.

o   Each Journey consist of List of Flights.

5)      simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].itneraryJourneys[journeyIndex].flightPnrLookupInfo[journeyflightIndex].flightLookupKey

o   Each flight is represented by unique key known as flightLookupKey.

6)      simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].itneraryJourneys[journeyIndex].flightPnrLookupInfo[journeyflightIndex].pnrGroupNum

o   A PNR can contain one or more flights and is designated by pnrGroupNum

7)      simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo

o   This represents the list of PNRS involved in this recommendation.

8)      simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[pnrGrpIndex].fareInfos

o   Each PNR consist of multiple fares or list of fares. Represented by this node.

9)      simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[pnrGrpIndex].fareInfos[pnrGrpFareIndex]

o   Each fare inside pnr is represented by this node.

10)  simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].fareInfo.bookingCombinations

o   Each recommendation can have one or more bookable combinations. Represented by this node.

11)  simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[bookingComboIndex].rKey

o   Each bookable combination is represented by a unique "rKey"(stands for "review" key).

12)  simple.recoms[indexOfRecom].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[bookingComboIndex].bookingComponents

o   Defines the components by which this combination has been made. It consists of list of booking component.

o   Each Component has pnrGrpNo (represent the pnr index) and fare index (represent the index of fare for that pnr).

 

Other fields within the core element are defined under schema. Please refer schema details.

 

Example-1: Let’s consider an itinerary where a customer travels from IXC to MAA on date 2022-05-18.

Simple Search Response contains four recommendations.

 

Representation of simple response

·         First recommendation simple.recom[0]

·         Second recommendation simple.recom[1]

·         Third recommendation simple.recom[2]

·         Fourth recommendation simple.recom[3]

 

First Recommendation (simple.recom[0])

Let’s consider a direct journey from IXC to MAA. This "journey" consists of 1 PNR which has 1 flight. Only flight is with airline 6E between IXC and MAA. PNR has 2 fare options. Now let’s see how they are represented in the json below.

 

·         Consist of single journey

o   recom[0].itneraryJourneys[0]

·         Journey consist of single flight

o   recom[0].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0]

·         Flight details consist of unique flight key and pnr group index

o   recom[0].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0].flightLookupKey = IXC$MAA$2022-05-18 07:40$6E-971

o   recom[0].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0].pnrGroupNum = 0

·         recommendation consist of fareinfo which has the pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo, in this case having single pnr group.

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0]

·         PNR consist of two fares, represented as below

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0].fareInfos[0]

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0].fareInfos[1]

·         Fareinfo also consist of booking combination, in this case 2 possible booking combinations

·         First booking combination pnrindex 0 and fareindex 0

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0]

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].rkey = RKEY:e3b4bbcd-c2c1-489b-9977-97ad7daf045d:6_0

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[0]. pnrGroupNum = 0

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[0]. fareIndex = 0

·         Second booking combination pnrindex 0 and fareindex 1

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1]

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1].rkey = RKEY:e3b4bbcd-c2c1-489b-9977-97ad7daf045d:6_1

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1].bookingComponents[0]. pnrGroupNum = 0

o   simple.recoms[0].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1].bookingComponents[0]. fareIndex = 1

 

Second Recommendation (simple.recom[1])

Let’s consider a one stop journey from IXC to MAA with a stop at DEL. This "journey" consists of 1 PNR which has 2 flights. First flight is with airline 6E between IXC and DEL and second flight is also with airline 6E between DEL and MAA. PNR has 2 fare options. Now let’s see how they are represented in the json below.

 

·         Consist of single journey

o   recom[1].itneraryJourneys[0]

·         Journey consist of two flights

o   recom[1].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0]

o   recom[1].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[1]

·         First Flight details consist of unique flight key and pnr group index

o   recom[1].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0].flightLookupKey = IXC$DEL$2022-05-18 13:05$6E-842

o   recom[1].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0].pnrGroupNum = 0

·         Second Flight details consist of unique flight key and pnr group index

o   recom[1].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[1].flightLookupKey = DEL$MAA$2022-05-18 16:20$6E-5071

o   recom[1].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[1].pnrGroupNum = 0

·         recommendation consist of fareinfo which has the pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo, in this case having single pnr group.

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0]

·         PNR consist of two fares, represented as below

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0].fareInfos[0]

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0].fareInfos[1]

·         Fareinfo also consist of booking combination, in this case 2 possible booking combinations

·         First booking combination pnrindex 0 and fareindex 0

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0]

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].rkey = RKEY:e3b4bbcd-c2c1-489b-9977-97ad7daf045d:0_0

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[0]. pnrGroupNum = 0

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[0]. fareIndex = 0

·         Second booking combination pnrindex 0 and fareindex 1

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1]

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1].rkey = RKEY:e3b4bbcd-c2c1-489b-9977-97ad7daf045d:0_1

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1].bookingComponents[0]. pnrGroupNum = 0

o   simple.recoms[1].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1].bookingComponents[0]. fareIndex = 1

 

Third Recommendation (simple.recom[2])

Let’s consider a multiple PNR journey from IXC to MAA with a stop at HYD. This "journey" consists of 2 PNR each has 1 flight. First flight is with airline 6E between IXC and HYD and second flight is with airline G8 between HYD and MAA. Each PNR has only 1 fare option. Now let’s see how they are represented in the json below.

 

·         Consist of single journey

o   recom[2].itneraryJourneys[0]

·         Journey consist of two flights

o   recom[2].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0]

o   recom[2].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[1]

·         First Flight details consist of unique flight key and pnr group index as 0

o   recom[2].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0].flightLookupKey = IXC$HYD$2022-05-18 06:45$6E-867

o   recom[2].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0].pnrGroupNum = 0

·         Second Flight details consist of unique flight key and pnr group index as 1

o   recom[2].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[1].flightLookupKey = HYD$MAA$2022-05-18 11:20$G8-503

o   recom[2].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[1].pnrGroupNum = 1

·         recommendation consist of fareinfo which has the pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo, in this case having two pnr group.

o   0th index pnr = simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0]

o   1st index pnr = simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[1]

·         Each PNR consist of one fare, represented as below

o   simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0].fareInfos[0]

o   simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[1].fareInfos[0]

·         Fareinfo also consist of booking combination, in this case 1 possible booking combination

·         Only booking combination (pnrindex 0 and fareindex 0) + (pnrindex 1 and fareindex 0)

o   simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0]

o   simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].rkey = RKEY:e3b4bbcd-c2c1-489b-9977-97ad7daf045d:5_0

o   simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[0]. pnrGroupNum = 0

o   simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[0]. fareIndex = 0

o   simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[1]. pnrGroupNum = 1

o   simple.recoms[2].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[1]. fareIndex = 0

 

 

Fourth Recommendation (simple.recom[3])

Let’s consider a two stop journey from IXC to MAA with a tech stop at IXL and another stop at DEL. This "journey" consists of 1 PNR which has 2 flights. First flight is with airline 6E between IXC and DEL having a tech stop at IXL and second flight is also with airline 6E between DEL and MAA. PNR has 2 fare options. Now let’s see how they are represented in the json below.

 

·         Consist of single journey

o   recom[3].itneraryJourneys[0]

·         Journey consist of two flights

o   recom[3].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0]

o   recom[3].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[1]

·         First Flight details having tech stop consist of unique flight key and pnr group index. Details of tech stop can be referred in flightlookupmap. (refer schema)

o   recom[3].itneraryJourneys[0]flightPnrLookupInfo[0].flightLookupKey = IXC$IXL$DEL$2022-05-18 10:00$6E-6003

o   recom[3].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[0].pnrGroupNum = 0

·         Second Flight details consist of unique flight key and pnr group index

o   recom[3].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[1].flightLookupKey = DEL$MAA$2022-05-18 16:20$6E-5071

o   recom[3].itneraryJourneys[0].flightPnrLookupInfo[1].pnrGroupNum = 0

·         recommendation consist of fareinfo which has the pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo, in this case having single pnr group.

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0]

·         PNR consist of two fares, represented as below

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0].fareInfos[0]

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo[0].fareInfos[1]

·         Fareinfo also consist of booking combination, in this case 2 possible booking combinations

·         First booking combination pnrindex 0 and fareindex 0

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0]

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].rkey = RKEY:e3b4bbcd-c2c1-489b-9977-97ad7daf045d:1_0

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[0]. pnrGroupNum = 0

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[0].bookingComponents[0]. fareIndex = 0

·         Second booking combination pnrindex 0 and fareindex 1

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1]

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1].rkey = RKEY:e3b4bbcd-c2c1-489b-9977-97ad7daf045d:1_1

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1].bookingComponents[0]. pnrGroupNum = 0

o   simple.recoms[3].fareInfo.bookingCombinations[1].bookingComponents[0]. fareIndex = 1

parameters.name: pft
parameters.description: Stands for pax fare type    REGULAR/STUDENT

parameters.name: it
parameters.description: fromcity-tocity-depdate for One way trip  or  fromcity-tocity-depdate$ fromcity-tocity-depdate for Round trip

parameters.name: cc
parameters.description: Stands for cabin class   E = economy   PE = premium economy   B = business

parameters.name: pax
parameters.description: A = no of adult   C = no of child   I = no of infant   In total A+C can be 9

parameters.name: resType
parameters.description: Type of response SIMPLE or SPLIT. SPLIT is support only for Return and multi city searches

parameters.name: pax
parameters.description: A = no of adult   C = no of child   I = no of infant   In total A+C can be 9

parameters.name: x-gommt-pfm
parameters.description: platform from which request is coming

SEAT.name: SEAT
SEAT.text: Paid seats only

SEAT.name: SEAT
SEAT.text: Standard seat included; non-standard seats chargeable

AMENDABLE.name: AMENDABLE
AMENDABLE.text: 0 (Nil) re-scheduling penalty applicable; fare difference applicable

meta.description: contains the meta data like criteria etc

requestId.description: this contains the value present in x-gommt-request-id header

core.description: contains the core search criteria for this response

cabinClass.description: cabin class present in search request

airlineCodeMap.description: contains the airline code and its name mapping

cityCodeMap.description: contains the airport code and its city name , country name mapping

name.description: name of city for the airport code

flightLookUpMap.description: contains the flight unique key (for within seearch response referrence) and flight data mapping

departureInfo.description: departue airport info of the flight

arrivalInfo.description: arrival airport info of the flight

techStops.description: technical stop info of the flight

locationInfo.description: location info of the teechnical stop

simple.description: represent the simple type of search responses. Every recommendation under this is one bookable combination. Each recommendation itself contains multiple fares represented by rkey whhich can be booked independently

transitVisaRequired.description: Is transit visa required for this recommendation

customCombination.description: Is this mmt made custom recommendation

itneraryJourneys.description: represent the list of journeys in the recommendation. One for One way , two for Return

buddyResult.description: is this journey has mmt made custom combination

nearBy.description: is this journey belongs to near by airport

durationInMins.description: duration of the journey in minutes

flightPnrLookupInfo.description: represent the list of flights involved in this journey

flightLookupKey.description: unique flight key that can be looked up in flightlookupmap

pnrGroupNum.description: represent the index of the pnr to which flight belongs to.

prevFlightConnectingType.description: if journey has more than one flight then it represent the typee of connection within flights

prevFlightConnectingDurationInMins.description: this represent the duration betwwen two connecting flights in minutes

fareInfo.description: represent fare details of the recommeendation

pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo.description: represent the pnrs info in the data

fareInfos.description: represent the fare info of the pnr

paxWiseFare.description: represent the pax fare of the pnr

base.description: airline base fare for the ADULT of the pnr

taxes.description: airline taxes for the ADULT of the pnr

serviceFee.description: mmt service fee for the ADULT of the pnr

instantDiscount.description: discount for the ADULT of the pnr

slashedTotalFare.description: represent the total fare before instant discount

totalFare.description: represent the total fare after discount

taxesSummary.description: represent the tax details for the ADULT of the pnr

airlineFixedFee.description: airline fixed fee for the ADULT of the pnr. Usually comes in cases 6E student fare.

totalFare.description: represent the total fare of the pnr for all pax types

base.description: airline base fare of the pnr

serviceFee.description: mmt service fees for the pnr

instantDiscount.description: total discount for all pax types  of the pnr

slashedTotalFare.description: represent the total fare without discount of the pnr

totalFare.description: represent the total fare after discount of the pnr

taxesSummary.description: represent the tax details of the pnr

airlineFixedFee.description: represent the airline fee for the pnr.

fareServices.description: represent the airline services of the pnr

MIN_TICKETING_TIME.description: represent the minimum ticketing time of the pnr

AMENDABLE.description: represent date change details of the pnr

CHECKIN_BAGGAGE_ALLOWANCE.description: represent checkin baggage details of the pnr

MAX_TICKETING_TIME.description: represent the maximum ticketing time of the pnr

CABIN_BAGGAGE_ALLOWANCE.description: represent cabin baggage details of the pnr

fareFamilyName.description: represent the fare family of the pnr

fareType.description: represent the fare type of the pnr

validatingCarrier.description: represent the airline carrier of the pnr for which cancellation rules are applicable

bookingCombinations.description: represent the multi fare combinations for the recommendation

bookingComponents.description: represent the pnr and its fare that makes up one valid recommendation fare

fareIndex.description: fare index of the pnr under pnrGrpdMultiFareInfo-->fareinfos

paxWiseFare.description: represent pax fare for ADULT of all pnrs involved in this combination

base.description: represent base fare for ADULT of all pnrs involved in this combination

taxes.description: represent taxes for ADULT of all pnrs involved in this combination

serviceFee.description: represent mmt fee for ADULT of all pnrs involved in this combination

instantDiscount.description: represent discount for ADULT of all pnrs involved in this combination

slashedTotalFare.description: represent total fare without discount for ADULT of all pnrs involved in this combination

totalFare.description: represent totalfare after discount for ADULT of all pnrs involved in this combination

taxesSummary.description: represent tax details for ADULT of all pnrs involved in this combination

airlineFixedFee.description: represent airline fee for ADULT of all pnrs involved in this combination

totalFare.description: represent total fare for all pax in this combination

base.description: represent airline base fare for all pax in this combination

taxes.description: represent airline taxes for all pax in this combination

serviceFee.description: represent mmt fee for all pax in this combination

convenienceFee.description: represent mmt convenience fee for all pax in this combination

instantDiscount.description: represent total discount for all pax in this combination

slashedTotalFare.description: represent total fare without disc for all pax in this combination

totalFare.description: represent total fare after discount for all pax in this combination

airlineFixedFee.description: represent airline fee for all pax in this combination

rKey.description: represent the review key for this combination. this is used to review any fare

combinationsCount.description: total numer of fares available under this recommendation

splitCombined.description: represent the split type of search responses. It contains the list of journeys and each journey contains the list of recommendation for that journey. If user search for DEL-BOM return then 0th index represent the first journey  DEL-BOM recommendations  and 1st index represent the BOM-DEL recommendations. Each recommendation itself contains multiple fares represented by rkey. One bookable component of splitcombined response is rkey1~~~rkey2. Here rkey1 represent the fare of 0th journey index and rkey2 represent the fare of 1st journey index

recomsByJourney.description: represent the journeys and its recommendations

0.description: represent the index of the journey

items.description: Represent the recommendation of the journey. Please refer the simple response section for details of the recommendation.

1.description: represent the index of the journey

items.description: Represent the recommendation of the journey. Please refer the simple response section for details of the recommendation.

comboFares.description: Represent RT discount fares provided by airline.  Combofare node has one bookable component of splitcombined-->recommsByJouneys (rkey1~~~rkey2) as key and has value as discounted bookable fare (again represented as rkey) .

RKEY:0e9f1c47-7a8e-42a8-af08-9bc0f88869e.description: represent one bookable component of splitcombined-->recommsByJouneys (rkey1~~~rkey2)

fareInfo.description: represent the discounted bookable fare. Please refer the simple response section for decription of fareinfo

rKey.description: represent the review key of the airline discounted fare. This is one valid bookable fare

errors.description: end of search stream with empty last packet in stream

errors.message: No response received from supply service
errors.description: Our systems are currently experiencing a technical problem. Please try again in ashort while.

errors.message: No response received from supply service
errors.description: Our systems are currently experiencing a technical problem. Please try again in ashort while.
The airline systems are currently experiencing a technical issue. Please try again in a short while.
The airline systems are currently experiencing a technical issue. Please try again in a short while.
The airline systems are currently experiencing a technical issue. Please try again in a short while.
Our systems are currently experiencing a technical problem. Please try again in ashort while.
Our systems are currently experiencing a technical problem. Please try again in ashort while.

taxes.description: represent airline taxes for all pax in this combination

serviceFee.description: represent mmt fee for all pax in this combination

convenienceFee.description: represent mmt convenience fee for all pax in this combination

instantDiscount.description: represent total discount for all pax in this combination

slashedTotalFare.description: represent total fare without disc for all pax in this combination

totalFare.description: represent total fare after discount for all pax in this combination

airlineFixedFee.description: represent airline fee for all pax in this combination

rKey.description: represent the review key for this combination. this is used to review any fare

combinationsCount.description: total numer of fares available under this recommendation

splitCombined.description: represent the split type of search responses. It contains the list of journeys and each journey contains the list of recommendation for that journey. If user search for DEL-BOM return then 0th index represent the first journey  DEL-BOM recommendations  and 1st index represent the BOM-DEL recommendations. Each recommendation itself contains multiple fares represented by rkey. One bookable component of splitcombined response is rkey1~~~rkey2. Here rkey1 represent the fare of 0th journey index and rkey2 represent the fare of 1st journey index

recomsByJourney.description: represent the journeys and its recommendations

0.description: represent the index of the journey

items.description: Represent the recommendation of the journey. Please refer the simple response section for details of the recommendation.

1.description: represent the index of the journey

items.description: Represent the recommendation of the journey. Please refer the simple response section for details of the recommendation.

comboFares.description: Represent RT discount fares provided by airline.  Combofare node has one bookable component of splitcombined-->recommsByJouneys (rkey1~~~rkey2) as key and has value as discounted bookable fare (again represented as rkey) .

RKEY:0e9f1c47-7a8e-42a8-af08-9bc0f88869e.description: represent one bookable component of splitcombined-->recommsByJouneys (rkey1~~~rkey2)

fareInfo.description: represent the discounted bookable fare. Please refer the simple response section for decription of fareinfo

rKey.description: represent the review key of the airline discounted fare. This is one valid bookable fare

errors.description: end of search stream with empty last packet in stream

parameters.name: itId

get.description:
Review API takes rkey provided in search api response as input and return the fare details after checking the fare availability with the airline.  

As part of response, it returns the journey details, flights involved in that journey and pnrs involved in that journey along with the fare details of the pnrs and complete recommendation. Also, it returns the itinerary id. Itinerary Id is a state of the user which finally gets booked, after review it now contains the review state having fare details. 

This API also provides the best coupons also known as recommended coupons applicable on this recommendation.  

This API is GET operation either based on rkey or itid . If used without itid as request param it returns the current fare after checking the airline fare availability.  If itid has been provided as request param then this api returns the cached review state or return error if review state is not available.

tnc.description: url for terms and conditions page

manualCashbackProcess.description: This field indicates whether bank cashback is manual

slashFareAtReview.description: true indicates that client can show discounted fare on review page

errors.description: client configuration not found for given client params

requestBody.description:
This API is POST operation takes couponcode as an input along with the itinerary id provided as part of review response.

It validates the couponcode and gives discount details in response.

flightLookUpList.description:
This containes flight releated info e.g depInfo, arrivalIfo, deptime

We generate key using ariline, depInfo, from , to etc
Against this key we store the flight info. 

NEVER parse this string key to get any info.

QR-QR-570-DOH-DEL-2022-04-17 02:10-2022-.description: Airline, airport, deptime etc detail for flight QR-QR-570-DOH-DEL-2022-04-17 02:10-2022-04-17 08:45

depTime.description: 1648862400000. --> time milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. or EPOCH time

dur.description: flight duration, can have default value of 0

recoms.description: This will always have only one element

itneraryJrnys.description: For OW this will have only one item, for RT two item

flightDtlsInfo.description:
It have flight details for journey 
If journey is direct then it will have single item
If journey is connected, list stores all those flight

fltLookUpKey.description: We use this key , to know flight details info from flightLookUpList ob

pnrGroupNum.description:
This indicates the pnr group for thsi flight
e.g "pnrGroupNum": 0,

cabin.description:
It indicates the cabin class for thig flight 
e.g "cabin": "E"

pnrGrpdFrInfo.description:
It holds the fareInfo at pnrGroupNum

Be can have multiple pnrGroup e.g 0, 1

frInfos.description: This will always have only one element

paxFares.description: It holds the fareDeatil for each pax e.g ADULT/CHILD/INFANT

singlePaxBaseFare.description: base fare of ADULT, please not that this can be -1 , if we have more than one pnrGroup

singlePaxTx.description: total taxof ADULT, please not that this can be -1 , if we have more than one pnrGroup ,

singlePaxTot.description: total fare of  ADULT, please not that this can be -1 , if we have more than one pnrGroup ,

singlePaxTaxBreakups.description:
This list contains tax break up for ADULT , 
could be multiple items in list

singlePaxAirlineFixedFeeTot.description: There are some fixedFee for 6e specail fare e.g STUDENT

G8-G8-530-DEL-BOM-2022-04-02 06:50-2022-.description: We can use this key to get flight detail from flightLookUpList

cancellationPenalty.description:
Cancellation penalty info , 
Can have multiple items

jrnyKey.description:
This jrnyKey references 
to node itneraryJrny: jrnyKey
Sometimes this jrmykey can be combination  of itneraryJrny:jrnyKey by || seperator 

In thtat case break by ||, then each will reference to itneraryJrny:jrnyKey

paxWiseTW.description: Holds penalty info per paxwise e.g ADULT, CHILD, INFANT

items.description:
"fromTimeWindow": 72,
                                                          "toTimeWindow": 8760,
                                                            "airlinePenalty": {
                                                                "cancellationPenalty": 4500.0,
                                                                "nonRefundable": false,
                                                                "calculatedPenalty": 0.0
                                                            }

 This indicates if user is cancelling before 72 hours of departure , will be charged 4500

dateChangePenalty.description:
Date chnage penalty info , 
Can have multiple items

paxWiseTW.description: Description of thos is same as defined in cancellationPenalty

baggageList.description:
Holds baggage info, can have multiple item
FOr each segment we have baggae info

conversionRate.description:
"conversionRate": "-1",
if unit is in PCS, then conversion rate tis used to convert inKg

get.description: Get penalty info for give itinerary id

get.description: This API is GET operation based on itinerary id provided as part of review response. It returns the booking id (or say hold id) which must be used to hold the fare or review state.

bookingId.description: unique id to identify this booking, set with value of bookingid received in request params

itineraryId.description: itineraryid that is received in request params

clientOrderId.description: unique id received in request parameters

flightLookUp.description: it is map of string and object with flight details

durationInMinutes.description: duration of this flight in minutes

journeys.description: list of journey objects of this booking

journeyKey.description: Unique identifier for each journey, value will be same for this journey in review response

flightLookUpKey.description: flightsLookUpKey is used to fetch this flight details in flightsLookUp map node

0.description: key value pair of value with fareinformation of this pnr

firstName.description: traveller first name sent to the airline/ name on the ticket

middleName.description: traveller middle name sent to airline/name on ticket

lastName.description: traveller last name sent to airline/ name on ticket

ADULT.description: paxtype as key and fareinformation for that paxtype as value

A fixed fee charged by Indigo for special fares 
ex:- student fare

A fixed fee charged by Indigo for special fares 
ex:- student fare

ADULT.description: key value pair of paxtype and paxwise fare information

payId.description: payment identifier that affiliate needs to confirm payment for to MMT after collecting payment from its customer

parameters.description: BookingId provided as part of generate booking id api

parameters.name: clientOrderId
parameters.description: This is transaction or order id of the partner

COUNTRY_NAME.description: value should contain country name against key COUNTRY_NAME

COUNTRY_CODE.description: value contains country code against key COUNTRY_CODE

userConsents.description:
list of user consents
ex:- with SKIP_DUPLICATE_BOOKING we don't restrict duplicate bookings

bookStatusCallbackUrl.description: endpoint to push booking details once booking is confirmed

requestBody.description:
This API is POST operation takes travellers details and contact details as an input along with the itinerary id provided as part of review response and booking id provided as part of generate booking id API. It also expects the client order or unique id for this transaction. 

This API validates the user inputs i.e., traveller detail and contact details if everything is as per the defined rules then API holds the fare at airline and return the response along with payId.  

PAYID is payment id of makemytrip which must be used to confirm booking.

id.description: Unique identifier for the given user.

emailVerified.description: Set to true if the user's email has been verified.

createDate.description: The date that the user was created.
